channel.title: Kira McLean on
channel.description: Recent content in Kira McLean on

item.title: The Current State of ML in Clojure
item.description: This is a cross-post of a recent post by Kira McLean at her blog, that has encouraged a few discussions over the web. Recently, a few of us at Scicloj have had enlightening discussions of of current state of the machine learning landscape in Clojure. This post is my attempt to distill it into a summary for the community’s benefit, so more people can understand where things are at and what the active developers in this space are working on.
